languages.text: "Это действительно очень прискорбно. Но таковы нынешние времена, и таков Футфол. Не всегда его обитатели ищут причину, чтобы пролить кровь".
"That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."
languages.original_text: "Это действительно очень прискорбно. Но таковы нынешние времена, и таков Футфол. Не всегда его обитатели ищут причину, чтобы пролить кровь".

traits.locale_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But such are the times, and such is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."
"That is indeed lamentable. But such are the times, and such is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."
"That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."
"That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."
"That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

languages.text: 「実に嘆かわしい。しかし、これが私達が生きている時代で、これがフットフォールなのだ。民達は必ずしも血を流す理由を探しているわけではない」
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: 「実に嘆かわしい。しかし、これが私達が生きている時代で、これがフットフォールなのだ。民達は必ずしも血を流す理由を探しているわけではない」

languages.text: “这确实很值得哀叹，但这就是我们生活的时代，这就是落脚港。根本不需要什么理由，它的居民就会横死街头。”
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: “这确实很值得哀叹，但这就是我们生活的时代，这就是落脚港。根本不需要什么理由，它的居民就会横死街头。”

languages.text: «Una catástrofe, desde luego. Pero vivimos estos son los tiempos que corren y esto es Paso. Sus habitantes no siempre buscan una razón para derramar sangre».
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: «Una catástrofe, desde luego. Pero vivimos estos son los tiempos que corren y esto es Paso. Sus habitantes no siempre buscan una razón para derramar sangre».

languages.text: « C'est bien triste, en effet. Hélas, nous vivons une époque compliquée et nous sommes à Castel. Ses habitants n'ont pas toujours besoin d'une raison pour faire couler le sang. »
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien triste, en effet. Hélas, nous vivons une époque compliquée et nous sommes à Castel. Ses habitants n'ont pas toujours besoin d'une raison pour faire couler le sang. »

languages.text: "Das ist in der Tat beklagenswert. Aber wir leben nun mal in solchen Zeiten, und das hier ist Footfall. Seine Einwohner brauchen nicht immer einen Grund, um Blut zu vergießen."
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist in der Tat beklagenswert. Aber wir leben nun mal in solchen Zeiten, und das hier ist Footfall. Seine Einwohner brauchen nicht immer einen Grund, um Blut zu vergießen."

languages.text: "Gerçekten esef duyulacak bir konu. Gerçi içinde bulunduğumuz zaman ortada. Üstelik burası da Binliman. Buranın sakinleri, kan dökmek için sebep aramaz."
languages.original_text: "That is indeed lamentable. But these are the times we live in, and this is Footfall. Its denizens don't always look for a reason to spill blood."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten esef duyulacak bir konu ama geçtiğimiz günler ve Binliman'da olduğumuz düşünülünce... Buranın sakinleri kan dökmeyi işten saymaz."
